doc.field: American Labor Conference on International Affairs Records
American Labor Conference on International Affairs Records

Halasi, Albert, Manuscripts Contains: - Halasi, Albert, "Bretton Woods and Full Employment," January 1945. ll pp. (2 copies) - Halasi, Albert, "Comments on the Revised White Plan," nd. l5pp. (2 copies) - Halasi, Albert, "Comments on Three Memoranda on the Postwar Tax System," nd. l5pp. (3 copies) - Halasi, Albert, "The Contribution of the Bretton Woods Agreements to Full Employment," nd. 33pp. - Halasi, Albert, "A Common Program for Business and Labor," nd. 23pp. (2 copies) - Halasi, Albert, "Note on the Subsistence of the German People After the War," February 1945. 5pp. - Halasi, Albert, "Should Germany Be Deprived of Her Industry? Comments on the Baruch Report," nd. l3pp. - "Papers drafted for research use by ALCIA officials"
